Our Methodology

At HalalNest, we follow authentic Islamic principles in all our calculations:

Zakat Calculation

  • Nisab based on 87.48g gold or 612.36g silver
  • Hawl (lunar year) requirement strictly enforced
  • 2.5% rate applied to eligible assets

Faraid Distribution

  • All Quranic heirs properly accounted for
  • Awl (proportionate reduction) applied when needed
  • Radd (return to heirs) applied when appropriate

Important: While our tools are based on authentic Islamic sources, we recommend consulting with a qualified Islamic scholar for complex cases.
